citations.narrative:
The licensee does not have official identification assigned to one litter of 2 American Eskimo puppies born on 25-July-
2023. Identification of each puppy is necessary for APHIS officials to identify each puppy and trace their movements. The
licensee must identify each puppy under 16 weeks of age by an official tag, a distinctive and legible tattoo approved by
the Administrator or a plastic-type collar acceptable to the Administrator which has legibly placed thereon the required
information or a cage card with all required information.
To be corrected by: 14-September-2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.50(a)(2) 
   
Time and method of identification. 
The licensee does not have official identification assigned to one litter of 2 American Eskimo puppies born on 25-July-
2023. Identification of each puppy is necessary for APHIS officials to identify each puppy and trace their movements. The 
licensee must identify each puppy under 16 weeks of age by an official tag, a distinctive and legible tattoo approved by 
the Administrator or a plastic-type collar acceptable to the Administrator which has legibly placed thereon the required 
information or a cage card with all required information. 
To be corrected by: 14-September-2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
